name: Embassy
description: A diplomatic mission in the opponent's nation that facilitates diplomacy, intelligence gathering, and espionage.

name: State Controlled Media
description: A media outlet under the control of the state can shape public opinion and narrative.

name: Allies
description: Nations that can be persuaded to take your side in international disputes, potentially imposing sanctions on your opponent.

name: Military Base
description: A location that hosts military equipment and personnel, enhancing security and military operations.

name: Research Institute
description: An organization dedicated to research and development, improving technology and scientific understanding.

name: Financial Institutions
description: Banks and other organizations that deal with the flow of money, affecting economic prosperity and the availability of funds.

name: Intelligence Agency
description: A government organization responsible for the collection, analysis, and exploitation of information in support of law enforcement, national security, defense and foreign policy objectives.

name: Advanced Technology
description: Access to advanced technological resources can bolster espionage efforts, military strength, and economic prosperity.

name: Abundant Natural Resources
description: Having access to abundant natural resources can boost economic prosperity and allow for increased international trade.

name: Large Population
description: A large population provides a larger base for the workforce, increases domestic approval, and can provide a military advantage.

name: Advanced Education System
description: An advanced education system can boost domestic approval, improve economic prosperity, and enhance technological advancements.
